name: Crisis in the Kremlin
summary: Don’t let the Soviet Union collapse, and fall in the darkness of history or lead the Union by a new path – democracy and free market! But before you decide something, think – wouldn’t it cause more harm than good?
info:
• 中文名: 克里姆林危机
  • 游戏类型: strategy, indie, simulation
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2017年3月20日
  • 售价: US$4.99
  • 开发: Barbu Corporation
